parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Containers

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add weapons to the cargo space of vehicles, which can be taken out by infantry units. 

MP Synchronized

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicleName [[addWeaponCargoGlobal]] [weaponName, count]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]] - vehicle to add the weapons to

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [weaponName, count]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> weaponName: [[String]] - weapon name. See the topic [[:Category:Weapons]] for reference about possible values.

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> count: [[Number]] - number of weapons to add.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_truck [[addWeaponCargoGlobal]] ["M16", 5];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addMagazineCargo]], [[clearMagazineCargo]], [[clearWeaponCargo]], [[addMagazineCargoGlobal]], [[addBackpackCargo]], [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[addItemCargo]], [[addItemCargoGlobal]], [[addWeaponWithAttachmentsCargoGlobal]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on November 7, 2011 - 11:02 (CET)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Bon_Inf*|Bon_Inf*]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Synchronized to [[Multiplayer Scripting#Join In Progress|JIP]] as well.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
